content.query:
--https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql-data-warehouse/sql-data-warehouse-tables-temporary
--Available only for the session of dedicated or serverless pool(Query window are sepearte session)
--Table name starts with #
--gets stored system databses temp DB
--can also the distribution 
--can be reated using CTAS statements

select * from tempDb.#tblPerson
